Lokavipatti Sutta：1．Lokavipatti Sutta．On eight worldly conditions which obsess the world and round which it revolves：gain and loss，fame and obscurity，blame and praise，contentment and pain．A．iv．156．

2．Lokavipatti Sutta． Average people are obsessed by the eight worldly conditions mentioned in Sutta 1； not so the Ariyan disciple who knows their impermanence．A．iv．157．
